titles.title: Equitable Population Adjustment Act of 1988
A bill to require the use, in Federal formula grant programs, of adjusted census data, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 4/26/1988--Introduced. Equitable Population Adjustment Act of 1988 - Requires the use of the most recent annual population data when determining the amount of benefit under Federal programs for a State, county, or local unit of government.
